idea-plugin.name: Application Insights Debug Log Viewer
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin allow you to see, instantly, in a nice way [Application Insights](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/app/app-insights-overview) logs. To use just start a program with the debugger or attach to a running one that use Application Insights. The logs will appear in the tool window named Application Insights.
**Still in early development stage**
You can report bugs or suggest amelioration on [github](https://github.com/Socolin/ApplicationInsightsRiderPlugin)
